about_the_game: This DLC is aimed at ATC beginners or ATC enthusiasts who are new to ATV voice command, learn how to correctly pronounce the special pronunciation of letters and numbers(in English & Chinese), as well as the letters and Chinese of each airline's call sign, please be sure to practice before playing the game;
detailed_description: This DLC is aimed at ATC beginners or ATC enthusiasts who are new to ATV voice command, learn how to correctly pronounce the special pronunciation of letters and numbers(in English & Chinese), as well as the letters and Chinese of each airline's call sign, please be sure to practice before playing the game;
legal_notice: This product is only for amateur players to experience and learn ATC scenarios and knowledge, and cannot be used in any vocational training, and the built-in scenes, images and data in the game are all generated by simulation and do not have any real reference value.
name: sim4D ATC - 空地通话基础发音说明（中英文）教程
short_description: There are three parts in the download package, two word files are pronunciation instructions and airline call sign comparison tables, and the other rar file contains English A-Z pronunciation examples, be sure to practice to improve the accuracy of your instructions.
